trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.

The WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Dostęp można uzyskać <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>zdarzenie <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>klasy, określając procedury o nazwie **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** w pliku Global.asax aplikacji ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>Tworzy <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>przy użyciu dostarczonych przez usługi IIS i bieżącej tożsamości systemu Windows <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>i przekazuje je do **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>obiekt dostarczony do **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzeń, aby ustawić <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>właściwości bieżącego <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>do niestandardowego <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie określisz wartości <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>właściwości podczas **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzenia systemu Windows identity dostarczonych przez usługi IIS jest używana jako tożsamość dla bieżącego żądania.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli usługi IIS używają uwierzytelniania anonimowego, a następnie <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>obiektu ma ustawioną wartość tożsamości zwrócony przez <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>— Metoda.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzenie tylko jest wywoływane, gdy uwierzytelnianie <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>ma ustawioną wartość <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>i <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>jest moduł HTTP dla aplikacji.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
